name: Dinomist Spinos
text: You can Tribute 1 other "Dinomist" monster, then activate 1 of these effects;â—? This card can attack your opponent directly this turn.â—? This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase this turn.
pendulum_text: If another "Dinomist" card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect, you can destroy this card instead.
